entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 March 2023
